description.value: You infuse your attacks with necromantic or radiant energies from beyond the material Universe. You infuse your attacks with spiritual energy for 1 minute. All weapons you're wielding and your unarmed Strikes become magical and either deal 1 additional spirit damage and gain the unholy trait against living creatures, or deal 1 additional spirit damage and gain the holy trait against undead.

publication.title: Starfinder Guilt of the Grave World
